name: Longshot
body:
# Longshot
## A random Dribbble client for iPhone & iPod Touch

Developed as a web-app for a school project, Longshot fetches a random shot from Dribbble.com, displaying it without upscaling. Coded with JS (jQuery), styled with SASS/Compass.
Visit http://maxsteenbergen.com/longshot on your iPhone/iPod Touch, and install on your homescreen as a Web Clip to use.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
